amendment.description: Amendment strikes the $42,676,000 in funding for the United States Institute of Peace and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 100 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce USIP by $42,676,000, and increases Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 163 (Roll no. 76).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 163 (Roll no. 76).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Weiner.
